articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: What makes baseball’s “magic mud” so special? - Ars Technica
articles.description: It has just the right mix of spreadability, stickiness, and friction to give pitchers a better grip on the ball.

articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: Hacker says they banned ‘thousands’ of Call of Duty gamers by abusing anti-cheat flaw - TechCrunch
articles.description: The hacker, who goes by Vizor, tells TechCrunch that they exploited a bug in the popular game's anti-cheat software for months.
articles.content:
In October, video game giant Activision said it had fixed a bug in its anti-cheat system that affected a small number of legitimate player accounts, who were getting banned because of the bug.
